title: Loading Screen :(
body: After i start league of legends there is only a league logo with a circle i think thats just loading and it wont stop i cant click on options to repair and i tried to delete the rads folder and reinstalling league , nothing works for me , please help :(((((

replies.body: The launcher not coming up like this is usually caused by an OS or software setting that's blocking it from loading.  You should go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that league is added as an exception and able to appear.  Let me know if that helps.
